name: ListApps
description:
Retrieve a list of all apps with optional filters and sorting.

This tool calls the Datadog API to list all registered apps. It supports filtering and sorting options and provides basic information such as app ID, name, and description. Useful for managing and viewing app information through automation.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of apps to return per page.

value_schema.description: The number of apps to return per page.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to return for paginated results.

value_schema.description: The page number to return.

parameters.name: filter_by_creator_email
parameters.description: Filter apps by the creator's email address. This is used to narrow down apps created by a specific user.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by the app creator. Usually the user's email.

parameters.name: filter_by_creator_uuid
parameters.description: Filter apps by the app creator's UUID. Provide the UUID of the user who created the app to narrow down the results.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by the app creator's UUID.

parameters.name: filter_by_app_name
parameters.description: Filter the list of apps by specifying the app name.

value_schema.description: Filter by app name.

parameters.name: filter_by_query
parameters.description: Filter apps by the app name or the app creator's name.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by the app name or the app creator.

parameters.name: filter_by_tags
parameters.description: Filter apps by specifying tags. Separate multiple tags with commas.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by tags.

parameters.name: sort_fields_and_directions
parameters.description: An array specifying the fields and directions (e.g., 'name:asc', 'created_at:desc') to sort apps by.

value_schema.description: The fields and direction to sort apps by.

parameters.name: include_published_apps
parameters.description: Set to true to include only published apps, false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by whether they are published.

parameters.name: show_only_favorite_apps
parameters.description: Set to true to filter and show only apps that you have marked as favorites.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by whether you have added them to your favorites.

parameters.name: filter_self_service_enabled
parameters.description: Filter apps by self-service enablement. True for enabled, false otherwise.

value_schema.description: Filter apps by whether they are enabled for self-service.
